      • moveCP

        public void moveCP​(int moveVal,
                   int maxY)
        Moves the checkPoint : Lowers the visible height of every checkpoint by a given value and removes checkpoints that go too low
        Parameters:
        moveVal - , an integer. The height of every checkpoint decreases by it.
        maxY - an integer. If a checkpoint's height is higher (ad it seems lower on the screen), the checkpoint is removed
